name: biannually

twice a year: The registry is updated biannually on 1 January and 1 July. The Committee meets biannually. Compare

More examplesFewer examplesApproximately 23,000 - 27,000 Sandhill Cranes migrate biannually through the San Luis Valley.Compounding of interest can be done monthly, quarterly or even biannually. The boys and their primary caretakers were each interviewed in their homes biannually for the first 4 years and annually thereafter. His office biannually compiles data comparing the number of referred complaints relative to market share for the top 12 financial groups.
